pkgmetadata.longdescription: Check Validity of FIGI, CUSIP, ISIN, SEDOL // With the functions in this package you can check the validity of the following financial instrument identifiers: FIGI (Financial Instrument Global Identifier https://www.openfigi.com/about/figi), CUSIP (Committee on Uniform Security Identification Procedures https://www.cusip.com/identifiers.html#/CUSIP), ISIN (International Securities Identification Number https://www.cusip.com/identifiers.html#/ISIN), SEDOL (Stock Exchange Daily Official List https://www2.lseg.com/SEDOL- masterfile-service-tech-guide-v8.6). You can also calculate the FIGI checksum of 11-character strings, which can be useful if you want to create your own FIGI identifiers.
